item.description:
Waltham Chiropractic and Optimum Health Solution invite you to a raw, organic, vegan potluck and documentary "May I Be Frank?"

Dishes for potluck must be completely prepared with recipes and serving utensils. Suggested donation of $10 for Real Kids Real Food after school program www.realkidsrealfood.org Plenty of parking (behind Waltham chiropractic an across the street). Seating limited. First come, first serve. For more information, please contact: Betsy.Bragg6@gmail.com or 781-899-6664. "Watch as Frank Ferrante, a 54-year old Sicilian from Brooklyn, NY, with a lifetime of drug & alcohol addiction and everything that comes with that is taken on a 42 day journey by 3 twenty somethings that include raw vegan food and transforms his health, weight, and view of the world."

Â
item.name: Potluck & Documentary : May I Be Frank?
